thread.title: Great hotel. Good location. Friendly staff and good decor
thread.title_full: Great hotel. Good location. Friendly staff and good decor - Review of The Trafalgar Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: paulcR4396WI
title: Great hotel. Good location. Friendly staff and good decor
text: The hotel is in a superb location. The staff were helpful and the rooms are a really good size. Can't fault it. Despite the central location was not disturbed by the hussle outside and the sound proofing is excellent.
